strIntroduction: A popular spot appearing in Korean variety shows such as “Running Man” and “We Got Married” that attracts many domestic and foreign tourists visiting as pilgrimages for many years! Rail Bike - Gyeongchun Line is a well-known natural treasury since the ancient time where visitors can pedal along railroad tracks while taking in amazing natural scenes.
strTitle: Gangchon Rail Park (bike reservation)

strIntroduction: One of the must-see shows in Korea, Nanta show combines Korean instrument which can break down national boundaries. Regardless of language and age, everyone will definitely fall for this show! Hey! Next time when you're in Korea, remember to experience this special drama culture!
strTitle: “NANTA” Show Ticket at Myeongdong

strIntroduction: Experience the life of trainees of Korean entertainment agencies. If you like K-pop and want to know all the news, you mustn't miss this best chance!! Start your dream here and gain the opportunity to have contract with large entertainment agencies in Korea. Come join us now, and YOU will be the next super star!
strTitle: 【Must be here】7-day Seoul Superstar Factory experience trip

strIntroduction: Never say you've been to Korea, if you didn't visited Seoul tower! Namsan Seoul Tower is one of the famous landmarks in Korea, where you can enjoy different views of Seoul. Here is also famous for using love-locker with your lover and friends to keep memory of this trip forever!
strTitle: N Seoul Tower tickets

strIntroduction: Since there's more and more flights to Daegu, it has become a new place to go in Korea. However, do yo know where to go in this mysterious city? We'll not only show you the 1300-year old Tongdosa Temple, but take you to the coolest festival, Chimac Festival! Hey, no more hesitation! Come and pay a visit to Daegu!
strTitle: Depart from Busan, Daegu Chicken and Beer Festival

strIntroduction: Traveling alone and having no idea where to go next? As long as you've come to Busan, you must not skip the harbor view! The local tour bus is surely your best choice! With tour guiding by local Busan residents, you can have a deeper understanding of this city!
strTitle: Busan Bus tour- night view of Korea

strIntroduction: Finally!!!! We can get rid of annoying traffics! In stead of saving your time, the Incheon-Seoul Express Train is way too convenient that you just need to transfer inside the airport! (Secret time: Seoul station is the only place where you can check-in previously!)
strTitle: AREX Express Train ticket (to or from Incheon Airport)

strIntroduction: Welcome to Everland, a magical world of adventures and excitement where Everlanders dreams come true. Set in lush hillsides 40km south of Seoul, this mammoth amusement park is regarded as one of Korea's best.
strTitle: Everland theme park QR Code Ticket

strIntroduction: Being one of the shooting scenes in Korean drama, "My Love from the Star" and a well-known spot in Seoul, Hangang River is absolutely a place you can never say you've been to Seoul without visiting it! Not only can you soak in the romantic drama mood, but fall for the gorgeous scenery of Seoul here. Don't forget to schedule this spot into your next trip in Korea!
strTitle: Hangang River Ferry Cruise

strIntroduction: Have you imagined yourself with a kpop-star makeup? We'll send professional Korean stylists to your place to put on makeup for you! It'll definitely be a marvelous experience!
strTitle: Korean style hair and makeup service

strIntroduction: Being one of the famous theme park in Korea, Lotte World provides not only indoor and outdoor facilities but shopping mall! No matter how old you are, you'll definitely fall in love with this place. What's more, one of the Korea dramas- Stairway to Heaven and Full House were both filmed here!
strTitle: Lotte World Tickets

strIntroduction: Crossover with the top wedding company, S.A. Wedding, we offer you the shooting experience with skillful photographers, hairdressers, and the most important, affordable price! Wanna create priceless memory with your beloved? Remember to schedule this wedding experience into your trip!
strTitle: Wedding shooting experince at Korea top wedding company, S.A. Wedding

strIntroduction: When people talk about Korea, they'll never forget about Kimchi! Seoul Kimchi Academy House not only provide you a special occasion to make your own Kimchi and topokki with experts but also make me more familiar with Korean culture!
strTitle: Kimchi and Topokki making and Hanbok fitting in Seoul.

strIntroduction: Would you like to explore the mysterious relationship between South and North Korea? What does the real North Korea look like? Let's discover the reality of the 38 Degree North and visit the invisible line personally to feel the excitement of silence!
strTitle: Korean Demilitarized zone (DMZ) and Joint Security Area (JSA) Panmunjom Tour

strIntroduction: Can't stand complicated metro transportations and language barrier anymore? Here's some packages just suit your demands. With private charter bus and driver, you can go wherever you want without worrying traffic problems.(Ordering a tour guide is available also!)
strLocation: Korea, Jeju, Gyeongju, Jeonju, Gangwon, Gyeonggi, Seoul
strTitle: Private tour in Korea

strIntroduction: As known as one of the successful Korean dramas, Descendants of the Sun has drew a huge attention among the world! Are u also a fan of Song-Song couple? If the answer is yes, you must not let this opportunity slip away! Come and visit the "Uruk" with us!
strTitle: One-day tour to Descendants of the Sun's filming spot, "Uruk" in Korea!

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard a province in Korea named Gyeonggi do? Although it's not that prosperous as Seoul, Gyeonggi do has lots of famous sightseeing spots, such as Nami Island, Petite France, and the Garden of MorningCalm! Hey, if you haven't been to these places, remember to plan them into your schedule!
strTitle: 1-day tour to Nami island, petite france and Gangchon Rail Bike

strIntroduction: Are you a super fan of Korean drama? If the answer is yes, you must not miss the tour going to the movie Gangnam 1970 and A Werewolf Boy filming spot. Besides, we'll also pay a visit to one of the five coastal wetlands on earth!

strIntroduction: Your trip best helper, KR Pass, not only saves your time and money, but provides a more convenient way to travel ariund in Korea!

strIntroduction: These beginner classes are introductory courses for those new to cooking or to Korean food. The cooking classes are taught in English. Classes last 1.5-2 hours (including lunch or dinner time& market tour).

strIntroduction: The most popular Korean Hiphop TV show, SMTM 5 will hold a live concert in Seoul this August. Wanna See rappers battle? Just come and join!

strIntroduction: VVIP exclusive! The specialized spa programs at Cheongkwanjang Spa G using six-year-old ginseng roots that will not only turn you more charming but ease your pressure!
strTitle: Cheongkwanjang SPA G in Gangnam

strIntroduction: Are you up for a challenge? There's no need to travel all the way to the opposite side of earth to take risks! The Dynamic Maze in Seoul is an action-packed obstacle course composed of 15 stages designed to be surpassed with strategy and teamwork. Just come and figure the clues out with your besties!
strTitle: Seoul Dynamic Maze Tickets

strIntroduction: Jeju Island has been well known for wedding photo due to its great natural sceneries. Snap photo in Jeju will give you unforgettable memory
strTitle: Jeju Outdoor Couple Photoshoot

strIntroduction: The never seen kungfu show, performing with exaggerating body expression not only breaks the language barriers but promotes eastern martial art! If you have big interest in eastern martial art, taekwondo, or you just enjoy special things, remember to book the tickets and spend an unforgettable night here!
strTitle: JUMP SHOW - Comic Martial Arts Performance

strIntroduction: Tour bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! As a harbor city, night views of Busan will definitely surprise you! Not only the stunning Gwangan Bridge, but the most popular spots, Haeundae Beach is all included in this route. Wanna create an irreplaceable city tour? Just a click and we can have fun in Busan together!
strTitle: Busan City Night Tour

strIntroduction: The royal cuisine has the highest quality when referring to Korean food. Come to Korean House, and be an emperor！
strTitle: Enjoy a royal cuisine and performances in the Korean House

strIntroduction: Do you want to dance like a k-pop star? Do you feel that k-pop dance is sooo cool? Let's Join K-pop dancing camp immediately. To dance like a super artist, you cannot miss the chance this time.
strTitle: 【Learn Dancing with the teacher of Bigbang 】KPOP Dance Training Camp

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. If you wanna leave your footsteps at Haeundae Beach, don't hesitate just click this and get ready for your trip!

strIntroduction: Have you ever wondered the same question like me, "Is there any special sight in Korea?" From the gorgeous scenery of Yangpyeong Dumulmeori Lake to Light Bulb Festival in Herb Island, just follow our footsteps and explore the different Korea with us!

strIntroduction: 內藏山名字取自於「山中藏有山」之意。每到秋天遊客總絡繹不絕，古刹内藏寺與周圍染紅的楓葉海相映成趣，深受國內外遊客的喜愛，絕對是韓國賞楓首選！
strTitle: 【韓國賞楓超值首選】全羅道內藏山一日遊（含登山纜車）

strIntroduction: Do you still remember the romantic proposal in 'Oh! My Venus' which is shot in Herb Island? Besides taking you to this gorgeous place, we'll also bring you to Edelweiss Swiss Theme Park to enjoy the exotic atmosphere over there and have some Korean snacks later!
strTitle: Day trip to Korea Tea room in Edelweiss and Lantern Festival in Herb Island

strIntroduction: Itaewon Land is a jjimjilbang opened in 2003 in Itaewon, which is a popular attraction place for foreigners in Seoul.
strTitle: Itaewon Land Sauna

strIntroduction: There are various exotic attractions here in Paju, one of classic filming locations of Korean dramas. Well-known dramas like City Hunter, You're Beautiful and The Heirs all have filmed here. Besides, there is no way to miss couple's favorite three attractions, Provence Village, The Botanical Garden BCJ and Heyri Art Village, when you visit Paju!
strTitle: Day trip to Paju City

strIntroduction: Besides NANTA, BIBAP, and the painters: HERO, here's a new show for you to enjoy in Seoul. Narrating the inspiring story of a crowd who determine to become firemen, FIREMAN offers us a 75-minute nonstop tense and impressive performance!
strTitle: FIREMAN show tickets (Buy one get one free)

strIntroduction: Repair the exhausted body right here! You must not miss the spa experience when you're in Korea! With six-year-old red ginseng using massage, it'll realize your stress, refresh your soul and make you prettier from the inside of your body simultaneously!
strTitle: Cheongkwanjang SPA G in Myeong-dong

strIntroduction: Do you want to enjoy amazing blossom scenes? Then, you can never miss fairytale Edelweiss Swiss theme park and the Garden of Morning Calm!
strTitle: 1-day tour to Edelweiss Swiss, Garden of Morning Calm and Gangchon Rail Park

strIntroduction: The shooting spot of "Running Man" and "We Got Married", you can not only soak in the beautiful scenery, but enjoy various kinds of facilities for all ages! As a collector of amusement parks, you must pay a visit to the very first one theme park in Korea!
strTitle: Seoul Land Theme Park Ticket

strIntroduction: Wanna be as gorgeous and breath-taking as K-pop stars on TV? KKday now offers you a special opportunity to experience a K-star's life. Not only will the professional stylists style you up from makeup to hair dressing, but the photographer will seize every single moment of you with his/ her camera!
strTitle: Personal Korean style up for personal photo album

strIntroduction: South Korean girl group, MAMAMOO, will hold their first concert in Seoul this August. As a fan of them, you mustn't miss this live concert.
strTitle: 2016 MAMAMOO Concert in Seoul

strIntroduction: To enjoy the color of autumn foliage, you can never miss Naejangsan! With 760 kinds of local plants, designated natural monuments, and various wild animals living inside, Naejangsan attracts people from all over the world to appreciate its wonders of scenes!
strTitle: 1-day trip to Naejangsan

strIntroduction: Enjoy unlimited ultra high-speed date connection at so cheap price!you don't need to carry on the wifi egg,the easiest way to share your amazing travel with friends!
strTitle: KT Sim card with unlimited data

strIntroduction: Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Wanna spend time with those adorable creatures and enjoy the view below sea level? Having a snorkeling experience with a professional instructor will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: Snorkelling in Jeju Island

strIntroduction: If you want to experience the romantic sight of Busan, you can never miss Gadeok Island. Following the steps of locals, you can realize the secret of Busan. Each corner is really worth photographing!
strTitle: Dynamic Busan Tour in Gadeok Island

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you Mysterious Road, Jeonbang Waterfall, and Jusangjeolli, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to a café beside the cost road to enjoy your time with a cup of coffee and amazing scenery around you!
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Southern Jeju

strIntroduction: Besides visiting one of the must go sightseeing spots in Korea, The Garden of Morning Calm, you'll enjoy a cup of coffee at Santorini Café with amazing scene surrounded. Last but not least, an exciting ATV experience is also contained in this one-day tour!
strTitle: Experience your Korea: A day-trip to Santorini Cafe+The Garden of MorningCalm+ATV rides

strIntroduction: A day trip visiting cultures of Korea, Jeonju Hanok Village and relaxing yourself at Jinan Red Ginseng Spa. Besides soaking in the spa with red ginseng and oriental medicinal herbs to release pressure, you are also able to embrace the scene of Maisan Mt. during your spa time.
strTitle: Luxury Red Ginseng spa experience

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. Let's leave our footprints from Oryukdo to the top of Hwangryeongsan Mt.!
strTitle: Busan City Tour Bus - Green Line(Igidae Direction)

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you the world hertiage, Seongsan Ilchulbong Peak, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Sangumburi Crater and Woman Diver Show.
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Eastern Jeju

strIntroduction: Take yourself on a higher and more exciting adventure with Gyeonggi paragliding experience. Soar above 520 meters in the sky and be amazed by the beautiful senery of the Yongjin city.
strTitle: Paragliding in Yongin city, Gyeonggi

strIntroduction: Summertime only! Besides following us to have an adventure in the Pig Museum and enjoy cuisines at the top ten restaurants in Gyeonggi do, you'll also pay a visit to the first premium designer outlet in Korea. What's more, you can have a glass of fresh grape juice and a box of grapes after the tour!
strTitle: Experience in Grapes Farm+Little Piggy Museum+Yeoju Premium Outlets one-day tour

strIntroduction: Do you wanna try something cool and fun in this busy city, Seoul? Viewed as the latest outdoor activity among the world, standup paddleboarding not only provides you an exciting experience, but let you enjoy the scenery on Han River simultaneously!
strTitle: Standup Paddleboarding On Han River

strIntroduction: Both voice and data with your own phone at affordable prices.Access to internet anywhere in Korea using Korea’s best quality mobile network.
strTitle: Korea EG Sim Card

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you Hallim Park, Suweolbong, and Spirited Garden, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Teddy Bear Museum and take you to the traditional Korean-style Buffet!
strTitle: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour to Western Jeju

strIntroduction: 位於忠清北道的丹陽，對外國觀光客來說是個相對陌生的地方，卻是韓國人賞楓的首選之一。此地尤其以歷史遺跡聞名，喜愛韓國歷史劇的朋友們，可千萬別錯過可穿越時光漫遊楓紅的機會喔！
strTitle: 韓國人私房賞楓景點，忠清北道丹陽一日遊

strIntroduction: Jeju Golden Bus City Tourprovides an opportunity to take a one-stop tour of the beautiful Jejudo.Unlimited transfers with Day Pass！！
strTitle: jeju golden bus city tour
